mapper.select: SELECT SELLER_NO, SELLER_LICENSENUMBER, SELLER_COMPANYNAME, SELLER_NAME, SELLER_ID, SELLER_PW, SELLER_PHONE, SELLER_ADDR, SELLER_GRANT FROM SELLER
SELECT PRODUCT_NO , SELLER_NO, PRODUCT_NAME , PRODUCT_PRICE , PRODUCT_BRAND , PRODUCT_STOCK , PRODUCT_OPTION , PRODUCT_CONTENT FROM PRODUCT WHERE SELLER_NO = #{sellerNo}
SELECT MEMBER_NO, MEMBER_EMAIL, MEMBER_NAME, MEMBER_PHONE, MEMBER_ADDR, MEMBER_LEAVE_DATE, MEMBER_GRANT FROM MEMBER
SELECT MEMBER_NO, MEMBER_EMAIL, MEMBER_NAME, MEMBER_PHONE, MEMBER_ADDR, MEMBER_LEAVE_DATE, MEMBER_GRANT FROM MEMBER WHERE MEMBER_NAME LIKE '%'||#{memberName}||'%'

SELECT MEMBER_NO, MEMBER_EMAIL, MEMBER_NAME, MEMBER_PHONE, MEMBER_ADDR, MEMBER_LEAVE_DATE, MEMBER_GRANT FROM ( SELECT ROW_NUMBER() OVER (ORDER BY MEMBER_NO) NUM, A.MEMBER_NO, MEMBER_EMAIL, MEMBER_NAME, MEMBER_PHONE, MEMBER_ADDR, MEMBER_LEAVE_DATE, MEMBER_GRANT FROM MEMBER A ORDER BY MEMBER_NO ) WHERE NUM BETWEEN #{startIndex} AND #{pageSize}
